content: crochet a **pinecone amigurumi** as a christmas tree ornament or home decor project for fall this pattern is great to use in garlands or decorative wreaths for christmas or autumn *this pattern is written in us terms* **materials** any yarn appropriate hook size tapestry needle stitch marker stuffing **yarn** for the pinecones in the pictures i used schachenmayr catania 137 yds / 125 m per 50 g in marone 157 paintbox yarns cotton dk 137 yds / 125 m per 50 g in coffee bean 411 stylecraft special aran 214 yds / 196 m per 100 g in dark brown 1004 **gauge & size** this pattern is too small to accurately determine the gauge below you can find the approximate sizes of the pinecone crocheted with different yarn and hook combinations sport 2 fine yarn 2 5 mm 12 uk 1 4 3 5 cm dk 3 light yarn 2 75 mm c/2 us 12 uk 1 6 4 cm aran 4 medium yarn 3 5 mm e/4 us 9 uk 2 2 5 5 cm **copyright** please remember that this pattern and the pictures shown here are the property of raffamusadesigns com feel free to use the patterns to make and sell your finished products but you are not allowed to republish or distribute this pattern or parts of this pattern in any way please do not use photos from raffamusa designs in your listings **follow me** **blog** https //raffamusadesigns com/ **youtube** https //www youtube com/channel/uczqyp_l6lj8_ic3fcq30wjg **facebook** https //www facebook com/raffamusadesigns **instagram** https //www instagram com/raffamusa_designs/ **pinterest** https //www pinterest it/raffamusadesigns/_created/ **ravelry** https //www ravelry com/designers/raffaella-tassoni
